title: Trochi, Turbines, Neritae Helices, from "Neues Systematisches Conchylien-Cabinet"
marks: Signature below double border line, LRC, in black: [Vogel so
description: 23 shells, mostly of conical or bulbous shapes and varied colors; long red and white conical shell at center; numbered \"Fig. 1577\" through \"Fig. 1599\"
creditline: Gift of the Print and Drawing Curatorial Council
